thread.title: Clarence ‘Clancy’ Dixon

author: KWBG
title: Clarence ‘Clancy’ Dixon
text:
Clarence ‘Clancy’ Dixon Posted on 07 October 2015 by KWBG 
BOONE, Iowa—Funeral arrangements have been set for 87-year old Clarence ‘Clancy’ Dixon of Boone, Iowa. A Graveside Service will be held Friday, October 9, 2015 at 11:00 AM in the Oakwood Cemetery in Moingona, Iowa. Military Honors will be conducted by the Boone Veterans Council. Burial will follow the service. 
There will be no visitation or calling hours. 
In lieu of flowers, memorials may be directed to the family. 
The Schroeder Memorial Chapel at Sixth and Marshall Streets in Boone is in charge of these arrangements. 
You must be logged in to post a comment. Boone Municipal, IA
